messages.subject: No mail
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, all. I hate to do this, but I m going no mail for a while. I ve had a lot of stuff happening lately...and in addition to financial and other difficulties,
messages.messageBody:
Hi, all.

I hate to do this, but I'm going no mail for a while. I've had a lot of
stuff happening lately...and in addition to financial and other
difficulties, I still have a puberty-stricken pre-teen to deal with and now
my grandmother is very sick.
I will miss everyone...and if anyone wants to get in touch with me, write to
my personal email addy since I already turned off the lists.
Thanks a lot.

Peace.
~`*S*`~
